definition: end/extremity/item/port/to hold sth level with both hands/to carry/regular
to sit/to take a seat/to take (a bus, airplane etc)/to bear fruit/variant of 座[zuo4]

sentences.english: He would not sleep like a corpse, nor stt like a guest.
sentences.chinese: 孔子睡覺不像死屍那樣僵直，家居不像做客那樣端坐。

sentences.english: Under the Linden Tree, Buddha sat up in the middle and appeared calm.
sentences.chinese: 在菩提樹下，佛祖端坐中間，神態安詳。

sentences.english: A porcelain Guanyin seated on a lotus flower over breaking waves.
sentences.chinese: 一尊瓷觀音端坐在蓮花瓣上，蓮花下是波濤紋。

sentences.english: He was sitting on the grass, very peaceful, smiling.
sentences.chinese: 他端坐在玻璃座上，非常安詳，面帶微笑。

sentences.english: Then he saw the Blessed One sitting surrounded by a large assembly, teaching the Dhamma.
sentences.chinese: 他看見薄伽梵爲衆人圍繞，正端坐說法。

sentences.english: She walked into the den and, sitting in a straight-back chair, stared into her windswept backyard.
sentences.chinese: 她走進書房，端坐在椅子上，盯着被風吹過的後院。

sentences.english: "Oh, " says Alvah sitting up glad, "and what else?
sentences.chinese: “哎呀，”端坐着的阿爾瓦高興說，“還有什麼？”

sentences.english: That's Gotama the contemplative, sitting surrounded by a large assembly, teaching the Dhamma.
sentences.chinese: 那是沙門喬達摩爲衆人圍繞，正端坐說法。

sentences.english: In front of their booths sit the merchants on silken carpets.
sentences.chinese: 貨攤前，商人們端坐在絲毯上。

sentences.english: Of time you would make a stream upon whose bank you would sit and watch its flowing.
sentences.chinese: 將時間築成一道溪流，然後端坐堤上，俯視其流動。

sentences.english: The orthopnea had gone away , and my energy level just went through the roof.
sentences.chinese: 強迫端坐呼吸疾病已經結束，我的精力又到頂峯。

sentences.english: On two rows of red cushions sat the members of the Committee.
sentences.chinese: 在兩排紅色的坐墊上，端坐着“委員會”的成員們。

sentences.english: You I soak in a moon in, sit up great stone.
sentences.chinese: 你我浸泡在月亮裏，端坐三生石。

sentences.english: And at that time the Blessed One was sitting surrounded by a large assembly, teaching the Dhamma.
sentences.chinese: 其時薄伽梵爲衆人圍繞，正端坐說法。

sentences.english: But there was no fever , orthopnea or decreased urine output noted.
sentences.chinese: 但是注意到沒有發燒，端坐呼吸，或尿量減少。

definition: to relax with one's eyes closed
praying mat (Buddhism, made of woven cattail)
to stand respectfully/(of trees, mountains) standing tall and majestic
to sit cross-legged/to sit in the lotus position
